message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.AI

The paper proposes a deep learning-based methodology for personalized size and fit recommendation in fashion e-commerce. The methodology involves ingesting customer and article data, optimizing a global set of parameters, and mapping additional customer and article attributes into a latent space to derive personalized recommendations. This involves techniques from machine learning (cs.LG), computer vision (cs.CV), information retrieval (cs.IR), natural language processing (cs.CL), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL, and cs.AI, in that order.
